page.title: 09HEALTH AND CARE IN REETH.1
page.content: {Dr Bell}looks after most of the people in the grid area.He has a Surgery in {Reeth}which is held twice a day on most days and he has one day off a week.His area extends as far as the county boundaries of Durham and Cumbria,and he estimates that he travells about 200 miles a week visiting patients. {Dr Bell}is rather unusual in that he has to dispense most of the medicines himself.His wife also helps with this.This is because the nearest Chemist is about 12 miles away.In addition he sometimes carries out minor operations in the surgery.Getting blood samples to the hospital is one of his most difficult tasks.He says that he likes the "helping" part of his job,but does not like the isolation of it.PTO p.18
